column4: guys, stop putting two words on a line and pressing enter, the problem will go away
if the host record is messed up for some reason yes
why would the host record be messed up, he's just said the issue
the error isn't an incorrect host one,
he said he couldn't ssh, in doing troubleshooting it's possible that he messed it up
randomly removing files isn't trouble shooting
thinking you know everything doesn't make you smart
I'm not silly enough to start randomly removing files
think about it, he imported the key incorrectly and could have messed up his ssh host record, it won't hurt anything if he removes it
importing the key doesn't touch known_hosts
also this is an open chat room, people are allow to post suggestions
yes, and I'm just informing you that randomly removing that file is not useful
randomly removing of a file is not what i suggested, i offered something that might help, whether you think it will or not
so I asked "how would removing the known hosts file help"
and i answered, learn to read, learn respect, and then logoff
drop teh attitude, if you can't help people properly, don't, randomly removing files with no reason is not helpful
when you are offering help that can cause problems, - it is
